rule.title: Additional Lore
rule.line: Your knowledge has expanded to encompass a new field. Choose an additonal Lore skill subcategory. You become trained in it. At 3rd, 7th, and 15th level, you gain an additional skill increase you can apply only to the chosen Lore subcategory.
rule.special: You can select this feat more than once. Each time you must select a new subcategory of Lore and you gain the additional skill increases to that subcategory for the listed levels.

rule.title: Adopted Ancestry
rule.line: You're fully immersed in another ancestry's culture and traditions, whether born into them, earned through rite of passage, or bonded through a deep friendship or romance. Choose a common ancestry. You can select ancestry feats from the ancestry you chose, in addition to your character's own ancestry, as long as the ancestry feats don't require any physiological feature that you lack, as determined by the GM.

rule.title: Reactive Shield
rule.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee Strike
rule.line: You can snap your shield into place just as you would take a blow, avoiding the hit at the last second. You immediately use the Raise a Shield action and gain your shield's bonus to AC. The circumstance bonus from the shield applies to your AC when you're determining the outcome of the triggering attack.
